name: Space Runner (Shmellyorc)
description:
A simple pixelated retro-style space shooter game using Godot Engine. How long can you last before you die! Post your scores or pictures of how far you have traveled!?

How to play?

All control info is in game.

How to run the game?

Mac/Linux: May have to give it permission to run.
Pc: Will get a popup asking if you want space runner to run on your pc.
